structure.unit: ARTICLE XCVIII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY YOUTH CRIME TASK FORCE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1437. Section 2-11.37(c) waived for this article.]
(c) of the Miami-Dade County Code which requires six (6) weeks between first reading and public hearing for consideration of an advisory board ordinance shall be waived for this article.
